remarks: Equality of integrals on open and closed intervals.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2014.)
statement:
itgioo.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
itgioo.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
itgioo.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( A [,] B ) ) -> C e. CC ) $.
itgioo $p |- ( ph -> S. ( A (,) B ) C _d x = S. ( A [,] B ) C _d x ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ph x $.
